A treatise of the great antidote of Van Helmont, Paracelsus and Crollius ... called the elixir proprietatis known by all physicians to be the greatest cordial and onely medicine in the world for long and sound life ... / written by J.H., a lover of truth, and made publick for the good of all people. J. H., lover of truth.
[2], 13 p.
Printed for the author, London : 1667.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
